Title: Tatsu no Ko Tarou
Description: ['Patterned after Japanese art and silk screens, Taro, The Dragon Boy is an animated feature about Japanese mythology and cultures, focusing on Taro, a young boy who has to make a voyage to a distant lake to save his mother, who has been turned into a dragon.']
Related: ['Parent story: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun S']
